snippet: New Jersey’s governor should sign the bill that ends this practice.
abstract: Op-Ed article by television host Bill Maher supports movement to ban gestation crates that house pregnant pigs; condemns crates, which do not even allow pigs, one of smartest of barnyard animals, enough room to turn around; criticizes New Jersey Gov Chris Christie for vetoing ban, and calls for its passage in state.
lead_paragraph: New Jersey’s governor should sign the bill that ends this practice.

headline.main: Free Pigs From the Abusive Crates
headline.print_headline: Free Pigs From the Abusive Crates
